name: unsullied-react-range-slider
description: A draggable selection ui that allows user to select a value from a range of values.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && babel src/RangeSlider.jsx --out-file dist/RangeSlider.js && node ./scripts/build-dist && cp src/main.scss dist/RangeSlider.scss && node ./scripts/build-dist && cp ./images/range_slider_handle.svg ./dist

author: Points
